video_info.title: A Fresh Start (or) Breathe Easy, Hope is Here
video_info.target_audience: People facing challenging situations - job interviews, first dates, public speaking, overcoming personal setbacks.
video_info.overall_tone: Uplifting, encouraging, with a touch of gentle humor.

narration_script.narration: We all have those moments... the ones that make us question, make us hesitate.
narration_script.image_script: A close-up of a person's face, looking uncertain and a bit lost in thought. Use muted, desaturated colors.

narration_script.narration: A new beginning  can feel daunting. But what if you had a secret weapon?
narration_script.image_script: A hand reaches out from off-screen towards a single, small sprout struggling to emerge from dry, cracked earth. Light is focused on the hand and sprout.

narration_script.narration: A tiny boost of confidence to help you face the unknown? Introducing SmartMouth Single Packs.
narration_script.image_script: Close-up of a SmartMouth Single Pack against a backdrop of shimmering, blue liquid. The liquid should have a magical, almost ethereal quality.

narration_script.narration: More than just fresh breath, it's a breath of fresh perspective.  A chance to rewrite your story.
narration_script.image_script: Timelapse effect. The sprout rapidly grows into a healthy plant, leaves unfurling towards the sun. Colors become more vibrant and saturated.

narration_script.narration: The job interview? You've got this.  Walk in with confidence, ready to impress.
narration_script.image_script: A person smiling confidently, shaking hands across a desk in an office setting. The background is bright and modern.

narration_script.narration: That first date? Relax, be yourself. Let your true personality shine through.
narration_script.image_script: Two people laughing together at a caf√©, enjoying each other's company. The atmosphere is warm and inviting.

narration_script.narration: Speaking your truth? Let your voice be heard. Share your ideas with the world.
narration_script.image_script: Someone confidently addressing a small crowd, captivating their attention. The setting is bright and airy, emphasizing openness.

narration_script.narration: Don't let anything hold you back.  Not even for a second.
narration_script.image_script: A close-up of a person smiling brightly, full of confidence and optimism. The background is a blur of warm, uplifting colors.

narration_script.narration: SmartMouth is there for you, every step of the way.
narration_script.image_script: A hand reaches into a bag or purse and pulls out a SmartMouth Single Pack. The focus is on the product and the ease of use.

narration_script.narration: Small enough to fit in your pocket, yet powerful enough to make a difference.
narration_script.image_script: A SmartMouth Single Pack is shown discreetly tucked into a pocket, ready to go wherever life takes you.

narration_script.narration: Fresh breath is just the beginning. It's about feeling empowered, ready to take on the world.
narration_script.image_script: A montage of quick cuts showing diverse people in various situations: acing a presentation, enjoying a concert, laughing with friends.

narration_script.narration: SmartMouth. Because when you feel fresh and confident, anything is possible.
narration_script.image_script: A close-up of a SmartMouth Single Pack. The background is a soft, hopeful sunrise gradient, symbolizing new beginnings.

narration_script.narration: Take a deep breath. Embrace the possibilities. Your fresh start awaits.
narration_script.image_script: The SmartMouth logo on a clean, minimalist background with a subtle, inspiring quote like 'Breathe. Believe. Achieve.'

narration_script.narration: SmartMouth: Your partner in confidence, one fresh breath at a time.
narration_script.image_script: A final shot of the SmartMouth Single Pack box, positioned slightly off-center on a clean background with soft lighting.

narration_script.narration: Find your fresh start. Find your confidence. Find SmartMouth.
narration_script.image_script: Fade to a clean background with the SmartMouth logo and website address prominently displayed.

image_tone_for_photoroom_api.scenes_1-4: Start with desaturated, slightly muted tones to reflect the initial doubt and uncertainty. Gradually increase saturation and warmth as the sprout grows and hope emerges.
image_tone_for_photoroom_api.scenes_5-11: Use bright, optimistic colors. Think natural light, soft focus, and a hopeful, airy feel. Emphasize genuine emotion and connection.
image_tone_for_photoroom_api.scenes_12-15: Clean, modern, and minimalist. Focus on the product packaging and logo. Use soft gradients and subtle textures for visual interest.

background_music_selection.genre: Uplifting acoustic/indie pop with a hopeful, whimsical feel.
background_music_selection.tempo: Start slow and gradually increase the tempo as the video progresses, building to an inspiring crescendo.
background_music_selection.instrumentation: Acoustic guitar, piano, light percussion, possibly some strings for emotional impact. Consider adding subtle vocal harmonies for a sense of warmth and connection.
background_music_selection.examples: Music similar to 'Riptide' by Vance Joy, 'Little Talks' by Of Monsters and Men, 'Come Away With Me' by Norah Jones (instrumental version), or 'Brand New Day' by Van Morrison.
